## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description           | Type                            | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------- | ------------------------------- | --------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | color scheme of login | `"blue" \| "green" \| "orange"` | `"green"` |
| `dark`   | `dark`    | use dark mode if true | `boolean`                       | `false`   |
